rules_text:
Exceed [i](Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value greater than the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
When this creature enters, look at the top three cards of your library. You may put a noncreature, nonland card from among them into your hand. Exile all cards not put into your hand this way.
